import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './item-card.css' const ItemCard = (props) => { return (

{props.name}

{props.currency} {props.value}
) } ItemCard.defaultProps = { name: 'item1', image_src: 'a294c255-8765-472c-8132-de368d706ea7', image_alt: 'image', currency: '$', value: '9999', rootClassName: '', } ItemCard.propTypes = { name: PropTypes.string, image_src: PropTypes.string, image_alt: PropTypes.string, currency: PropTypes.string, value: PropTypes.string, rootClassName: PropTypes.string, } export default ItemCard
